artist: Artist: Harada Kōkyo; Publisher: Matsuki Heikichi
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: vertical ōban triptych; large sinking ship with orange bottom, with orange explosion in sky; smaller ships in LRC; three pages attached together
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
text: This version has also an English title.
title: Picture of Our Destroyers Hayatori and Asagiri Sinking an Enemy Warship at Port Arthur During a Great Snowstorm
